messages.text:
Hello agl@golang.org, dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto

why?

On Thu, Jul 25, 2013 at 8:06 PM,  <agl@golang.org> wrote:
> This seems worse to me.
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/11881043/



-- 
Han-Wen Nienhuys
Google Munich
hanwen@google.com

Especially because it allocates now.
 On Jul 25, 2013 4:06 PM, <agl@golang.org> wrote:

> This seems worse to me.
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/11881043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/11881043/>
>

You could just make a global variable for the byte slice.

> *** Abandoned ***
